III.ii.2.F.1.h
.
Completing a Formal Finding When Attempts to Verify Service Are Unsuccessful
A formal finding should be completed by the Military Records Specialist (MRS) when
an original or acceptable copy of a discharge document cannot be obtained
a negative response from NPRC has been received, or a request could not be submitted
the Veterans Information Solution and VA/Department of Defense Identity Repository do not contain service information
service information cannot be verified from alternate sources, and
a final notification letter has been sent to the claimant (if applicable)
.
Note
:  When referring a case to an MRS for completion of the formal finding referenced in this block, add
Specialized Records Request
as a special issue.
References
:  For more information on
acceptable forms of evidence of qualifying service, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 1.B.3.a
unacceptable alternative forms of evidence and unsuccessful attempts to verify service, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 1.B.3.d
alternate sources of evidence of service, see
M21-1 Part III, Subpart i, 1.B.4.b
, and
MRS actions to complete a formal finding for verification of service, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.F.1.i
.
